name: whenMemoizationIsTruePodamShouldReturnTheSameInstanceForDifferentInvocations

testSteps.description: Given a Standard Podam Factory with memoization enabled

children.description: Given a Random Data Provider Strategy with memoization set to true

testSteps.description: Then Data Provider Strategy should have memoization true
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters
Then the pojo SimplePojoToTestSetters ( stringField = FgRdpXB9nv    intField = 174658749     ) must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters
Then the pojo SimplePojoToTestSetters ( stringField = FgRdpXB9nv    intField = 174658749     ) must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SimplePojoToTestSetters

Then the SimplePojoToTestSetters ( stringField = FgRdpXB9nv    intField = 174658749     ) and SimplePojoToTestSetters ( stringField = FgRdpXB9nv    intField = 174658749     ) should be strictly equal (e.g. according to == operator)

title: When memoization is set to true Podam should return the same instance for different invocations
